alert.note: Alert for Ness; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 16 at 5:21AM CDT until October 18 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. For the second Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Ness County. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Monday morning. For the second Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: A Freeze Watch means sub-freezing temperatures are possible. These conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
